<title level="1" right="Trait">[Additive](/Traits.aspx?ID=795)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 61 <sup>1.1</sup>

Feats with the additive trait allow you to add special substances to alchemical consumables you create when you use [Quick Alchemy](/Actions.aspx?ID=2801) to create a consumable (you can't use additives with quick vials). You can add only one additive to a single alchemical item, you can add an additive only once per round, and most additive abilities specify a subset of alchemical consumables you can add them to.
name: Additive
